evidence.claim: Providence Digital Innovation Group utilizes AWS for its cloud services.
The company integrates healthcare data standards like FHIR and HL7 in its applications.
They support electronic data interchange using X12 standards.
Providence uses Snowflake for its data warehousing solutions.
The organization employs REST APIs for seamless integration with EHR systems.
Providence includes integration middleware and support for EDI transactions on their platform.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in health tech with a focus on EDI and X12 transactions for interoperability.
